title: AI App Builder
description: We severely limit the growth, richness and reach of the Cardano platform by building one-size-fits all solutions

f6_assessments.q0: The AI app builder is a futuristic proposal that aims to host a Kaggle competition to solve the problem of AI building dAPPs. It is an interesting and possibly a productive idea worth exploring with high inherent risk. The approach is ideal to solve complex problems in a organic manner however in this nascent stage the proposal may not yield the desired high return for the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The referenced GitHub repository is empty; however, Qmodeler software has a strong development team that can organize the Kaggle completion in the required manner. However, for a proposal that is requesting 200k plus, it is expected that the dataset and problem statement for the competition should have been prepared ab initio. The same could have been useful outside Kaggle for open research.
f6_assessments.q2: The is an excellent chance that the competition will be conducted successfully. There is a need to evaluate the competition's success with the fallout effect on the app ecosystem. It is not clear on how the project's success can be audited in a measurable manner.

solution: A new approach where AI converts a description of a problem into a working and formally verified solutions(s)
experience: Team of 20 passionate individuals with 4 years of experience building the first no-code project targeting blockchain.
